about_the_game:
Heroic Characters 16


This token pack contains 36 tokens. This pack contains a variety of characters that can be used as PC’s or NPC’s.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Female Human Alchemist
  • 2 Female Human Assassins
  • Female Human Cleric
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Forest Hunter
  • Female Human Jungle Warrior
  • Female Human Mantis Assassin
  • Female Human Pyro Wizard
  • Female Human Tracker
  • 2 Female Human Vampire Hunters
  • Female Human Warrior
  • Female Human Wizard
  • Male Black Knight
  • Male Human Bard Rocker
  • 2 Male Human Clerics
  • Male Human Corrupted Wizard
  • Male Human Duelist
  • Male Human Fighter
  • Male Human Mage
  • 2 Male Human Manga Fighters
  • Male Human Masked Axeman
  • Male Human Orb Holder
  • Male Human Prisoner
  • Male Human Purple Mage
  • Male Human Pyro Wizard
  • Male Human Rage Barbarian
  • Male Human Red Assassin
  • Male Human Rogue
  • Male Human Soldier
  • Male Human Spartan Leader
  • Male Human Thug
  • Male Human Warrior

Released on March 31, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Conversion by: James Holloway

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
